name: ORCAS Platform
shortDescription:
Developed for the University of Wollongong Hong Kong Campus
Hosted on https://orcas.uowchk.edu.hk
Alternative URL https://orcas.johnnyip.com

  • Students upload resources with description and URL
  • Can be a article, a thesis or a video

  • School staff edit and approve the information of resources.
  • The resources will be displayed on the website publicly
  • Other students can search resources by keywords and filters
longDescription:
Developed for the University of Wollongong Hong Kong Campus
Hosted on https://orcas.uowchk.edu.hk
Alternative URL https://orcas.johnnyip.com

The design and frontend (HTML, CSS): Done by summer interns (I am the instructor)

Other parts include frontend Js (React.js), backend Spring Boot (Hibernate, Spring Security, JWT) are done by me.

Main functionality

  • Students upload resources with description and URL
  • Can be a article, a thesis or a video

  • School staff edit and approve the information of resources.
  • The resources will be displayed on the website publicly
  • Other students can search resources by keywords and filters

name: Supply Chain Finance Operation Platform
shortDescription:
[FYP] A system for stakeholders in supplychain finance

  • Delivery Order Management
  • Delivery checkpoints - Map View
  • Documents Storage
  • Synchronize Data To Private Blockchain
longDescription:
[FYP]
A system for stakeholders involved in the Supply Chain Finance (Supplier, distributor, driver)
They can manage and closely monitor the delivery status, and synchronize all the data to a private blockchain network.

Tech Stack

FrontendReact.js
Hosted using Docker

Libraries used:
  • Redux-toolkit (State Container)
  • Mantine (UI Components)
  • Next.js (Server-side Rendering)
  • Tabler (Icons)
  • Axios (HTTP requests)
Backend (Operation Centre)Spring Boot
Connected to MySQL
Hosted using Tomcat

  • Spring Security (JWT)
  • Spring Data JPA
  • Hosted with Tomcat
Backend (Blockchain Centre)Hyperledger Fabric
  • A Single-node Linux
  • Running Docker Containers

Perform Read and Insert operations with an API endpoint
  • Hyperledger Fabric Gateway SDK
  • Spring Boot Application
  • Hosted with Tomcat

DatabaseMySQL
File StorageAWS S3 bucket (Pre-signed URL)
CI/CDJenkins
